channel.title: Haptics on J. Felipe Gonzalez, Ph.D.

item.title: Adaptic: A Shape Changing Prop with Haptic Retargeting
Facilitating Programming-based 3D Computer-Aided Design using Bidirectional Programming
item.description: You know how most 3D CAD tools are pretty intuitive, with those drag-and-drop interfaces that let you tweak your designs with ease? Well, there’s another side to CAD—a programming-based approach. Sure, it can seem a bit daunting at first, with all the coding involved, but it opens up some incredible possibilities for your designs. The problem is that not many people use it. Why? Mainly because it’s not the easiest thing to get into, and honestly, we don’t fully understand all the challenges that come with it.
